src:
Nintendo Switch, Luigi's Mansion 3 il gioco più venduto su eShop nella settimana 44 del 2019
Luigi's Mansion 3 raggiunge la vetta della classifica eShop. Vediamo gli altri titoli che hanno avuto più successo negli ultimi giorni.
02 Nov 2019 by Davide Spotti
Luigi's Mansion 3 è in testa alla classifica dell'eShop di Nintendo Switch nella settimana 44 del 2019.Scende in seconda posizione NEO GEO Metal Slug, che precede Minecraft e i pre-order di Pokémon Spada + SteelBook gratuita.The Way Remastered è quinto, davanti a Castle of Heart, Soccer Slammers e Cuphead. Chiudono la top 10 Outlast II e i pre-order di Pokémon Scudo + SteelBook gratuita. Qui di seguito l'elenco delle prime venti posizioni:

Luigi's Mansion 3
NEO GEO Metal Slug
Minecraft
Pokémon Spada + SteelBook gratuita (pre-order)
The Way Remastered
Castle of Heart
Soccer Slammers
Cuphead
Outlast II
Pokémon Scudo + SteelBook gratuita (pre-order)
Outlast
Untitled Goose Game
CMS
Pokémon Spada (pre-order)
Cat Quest II
Pokémon Scudo (pre-order)
Ori and the Blind Forest: Definitive Edition
FIFA 20
Blasphemous
Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
text:
Nintendo Switch, Luigi's Mansion 3 the best-selling game on eShop in week 44 of 2019
Luigi's Mansion 3 reaches the top of the eShop ranking. We see the other titles that have been more successful in recent days.
02 Nov 2019 by Davide Spotti
Luigi's Mansion 3 is at the top of the Nintendo Switch eShop ranking in week 44 of 2019. It goes down to second place NEO GEO Metal Slug, which precedes Minecraft and the pre-orders of Pokémon Sword + free SteelBook. The Way Remastered is fifth, ahead to Castle of Heart, Soccer Slammers and Cuphead. The top 10 Outlast II and the pre-orders of Pokémon Shield + SteelBook are closed. Below is the list of the top twenty positions:

Luigi's Mansion 3
NEO GEO Metal Slug
Minecraft
Sword Pokémon + free SteelBook (pre-order)
The Way Remastered
Castle of Heart
Soccer Slammers
Cuphead
Outlast II
Pokémon Shield + Free SteelBook (pre-order)
Outlast
Untitled Goose Game
CMS
Sword Pokémon (pre-order)
Cat Quest II
Shield Pokémon (pre-order)
Ori and the Blind Forest: Definitive Edition
FIFA 20
Blasphemous
Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
